original: 曹操設下埋伏，靜靜等候，直到袁紹兵馬開始掠奪物資才下令騎兵奇襲，袁紹軍死傷慘重，潰敗而逃，曹軍則順利退回官渡。
text: Cao Cao set up an ambush and waited quietly. It was not until Yuan Shao's soldiers began to plunder supplies that they ordered the cavalry surprise attack. Yuan Shaojun suffered heavy casualties and fled in a rout. Cao Jun smoothly retreated to Guandu.
